DB_PROVIDER.description: Database provider for Hot Updater (supabase, aws, aws-rds, postgres, cloudflare-d1)

NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL.description: Your Supabase project URL (required if DB_PROVIDER=supabase). Get from: https://app.supabase.com/project/_/settings/api

NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY.description: Your Supabase anonymous key (required if DB_PROVIDER=supabase)

HOT_UPDATER_S3_BUCKET_NAME.description: AWS S3 bucket name for Hot Updater bundles (required if DB_PROVIDER=aws)

HOT_UPDATER_S3_REGION.description: AWS region for S3 bucket (e.g., us-east-1)

HOT_UPDATER_S3_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: AWS access key ID for S3 access (required if DB_PROVIDER=aws)

HOT_UPDATER_S3_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: AWS secret access key for S3 access (required if DB_PROVIDER=aws)

HOT_UPDATER_CLOUDFRONT_DISTRIBUTION_ID.description: Optional: CloudFront distribution ID for CDN access

AWS_RDS_HOST.description: AWS RDS PostgreSQL host (required if DB_PROVIDER=aws-rds)

AWS_RDS_DATABASE.description: AWS RDS database name (required if DB_PROVIDER=aws-rds)

AWS_RDS_USER.description: AWS RDS database user (required if DB_PROVIDER=aws-rds)

AWS_RDS_PASSWORD.description: AWS RDS database password (required if DB_PROVIDER=aws-rds)

AWS_REGION.description: AWS region for S3 with RDS (required if using S3 with aws-rds)

AWS_S3_BUCKET_NAME.description: AWS S3 bucket for bundle storage with RDS (required if using S3 with aws-rds)

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: AWS access key ID for S3/DynamoDB (required for aws-rds with S3 or dynamodb)

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: AWS secret access key for S3/DynamoDB (required for aws-rds with S3 or dynamodb)

DATABASE_URL.description: PostgreSQL connection string (required if DB_PROVIDER=postgres). Format: postgresql://user:password@host:5432/database

CLOUDFLARE_D1_DATABASE_ID.description: Cloudflare D1 database ID (required if DB_PROVIDER=cloudflare-d1)

HOT_UPDATER_PROJECT_PATH.description: Optional: Path to your React Native project with hot-updater.config.ts (needed for deployments from dashboard)

NEXT_PUBLIC_DASHBOARD_URL.description: Dashboard URL (will be auto-filled by Vercel)
